channel.title: Why?
channel.description:
Why the hell is taharok a "Java Guru" and Batman???
Java guru my ass [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] You are in no position to pass judgment on who here gets an award or not, and even if you are going to post your opinion, you can do it nicely..[/center]

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Taharok deserves all the awards he has been given, for many reasons. Do not think that he does not deserve them as he has helped this community in many ways than imaginable. He received his Java Cup as he has proved his Java knowledge on Moparisthebest countless times, and he has created framework which I have half-witnessed before, and there are many deeds he has done to deserve this cup. He deserves his Batman cup as he has helped many people on these forums as well as helped the entire website over the years. What you’ve just stated is ignorant and self-centered in my opinion.

I won’t ramble on, and we all know where this thread is headed if it remains open, so Newty closed it before me. ;\

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You are in no position to pass judgment on the awards that are given out on this site…

As for AMERIKA, don’t be so straightforward…

[quote=“AMERIKA, post:14, topic:317803”]ur fucking retarded, cows1471.

[ img]http://images.starcraftmazter.net/4chan/for_forums/op_faggot2.jpg[/img][/quote]
this

I think Taharok deserves his batman cup, but I dont think he should get it. It has forever been mjordans cup!

cows, your an idiet- he knows more java than you. You might think he knows nothing, that is because he never releases anything however he is very knowledgable

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:7, topic:317803”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=414314.msg3050173#msg3050173 date=1260040715]
Either way, you have no say in who deserves their cups. And you’re in no position for judgment, criticism is only given out by those who have the experience enough to make the criticism.

Once again:

You still haven’t provided a reason why he doesn’t deserve them.

[/quote]

What java software has he released that i could have used?
Does he work with servers?
Does he do anything java related except for the IRC?[/quote]
Just look at his topics over moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:4, topic:317803”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=414314.msg3050152#msg3050152 date=1260040306]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=414314.msg3050150#msg3050150 date=1260040240]

Why the hell is taharok a “Java Guru” and Batman???

Java guru my ass
[/quote]Why do you have to ask. Obviously if it was given to him he deserved it. And tbh, I’d say out of anyone Taharok would deserve the batman cup.

You still haven’t provided a reason why he doesn’t deserve them.

When was the last time he worked with java or posted java work?
Does he have a batmobile?
[/quote]You’re completely ignorant. The batman cup goes to someone who has been extraordinarily helpful throughout the mopar sites. It has nothing to literally do with batman other than the symbolism of a “hero”. As for Java guru, he’s proven himself many times via irc from my experience. As for throughout the forum, I’m sure he’s done something.[/quote]

  1. Batmobile shit was a joke
  2. I really dont think he deserves java guru

Read full topic
